bug.author: st--
bug.description: While the documentation for the branch is now building freshly on each merged pull request, the documentation is out of date. This was evidenced by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/GPflow/GPflow/issues/1403>#1403</denchmark-link> , which pointed out that the <denchmark-link:https://gpflow.readthedocs.io/en/master/notebooks/advanced/multiclass_classification.html>multiclass classification notebook (master)</denchmark-link> had a bug, whereas everything was working fine as expected in the <denchmark-link:https://gpflow.readthedocs.io/en/develop/notebooks/advanced/multiclass_classification.html>develop version</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: Thanks to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vdutor>@vdutor</denchmark-link> for manually kick-starting the documentation build for as a one-off - this brings the documentation up to date with the 2.0 release from yesterday. We should automate this in the long run, but has lower priority for now.
